official_title: To provide for an increase in the supplemental security insurance benefit standard for long-term care recipients based on the cost of living adjustment.

summary.text: Amends title XVI (Supplemental Security Income) (SSI) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to require the Commissioner of Social Security annually to adjust the SSI benefit standard for long-term care recipients based on the percentage increase in the cost of living adjustment for primary insurance amounts under the Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance (OASDI) program under SSA title II.
